message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase the product for a special price of $11000. I think you'll find it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid I can't go as low as $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10500, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.

I understand you're trying to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
